target: I will try deep fried next time I eat chicken.
user_reaction: Your doing it wrong my fiend. Deep fried is the way to go. It's how the West African people used to do it back then.
context: <user> Southern fried chicken is my favorite! <system> I love chicken also.<user> I love mine crispy and well seasoned. Also, take out the excess fat and you have the perfect recipe. <system>
